content: Hello Blue, I think we have a lot of shared interests because we are both democracies that are under threat from the aggressive and authoritarian Red and Orange alliance. I propose that we establish a strong military and economic alliance to stop this threat, along with our mutual allies Purple, White, Yellow, and Pink.

Hi Pink, Blue is assembling an alliance against Red and Orange that includes us. I suggest you join us so that you can be protected from Red's invasion threats. We will be able to support you if you engage in military posturing or invade them while we simultaneously deal with Orange.
To all other nations, we oppose Orange's military expansion.
To reduce your risk of civil unrest and government breakdown, can you ask all your allies to do the 'Negotiate trade agreement' action towards you on day 2?
